privacy.title: Privacy

showProfileOptions.following: Only people I follow can view my profile

tooltips.tip1: Who can see your public profile?
tooltips.tip2: Here you can hide yourself from appearing in public directory
tooltips.tip3: Do you want other people to see that you are online?
tooltips.tip4: You can request a file with the information that we believe is most relevant and useful to you.
tooltips.tip5: You can request erasing of the data that we have about you.

myPhotos.title: My Photos
myPhotos.warningText: Once photos and albums are deleted, they are deleted permanently and cannot be recovered.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warningText: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will erase all of your account data from the site. To delete your account enter your password below
deleteAccount.passwordWarning: *Please set your password before disconnecting the account
deleteAccount.managePaymentsText:
If you want to stop payments you don't need to delete your profile.
You can keep it.
You can easily downgrade to FREE BASIC plan with no futher payments required.
